Title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
Writer: Vijayendra Prasad (story by), S.S. Rajamouli (screenplay by), C.H. Vijay Kumar (telugu dialogue), Ajay Kumar (telugu dialogue), Madhan Karky (tamil dialogue), Manoj Muntashir (hindi dialogue), Mankombu Gopalakrishnan (malayalam dialogue)
Actors: Prabhas, Rana Daggubati, Anushka Shetty, Sathyaraj
Plot: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.
